fraser-etal-2019-feel.title: How do we feel when a robot dies? Emotions expressed on Twitter before and after hitchBOT's destruction
fraser-etal-2019-feel.author:
Fraser, Kathleen C.  and
Zeller, Frauke  and
Smith, David Harris  and
Mohammad, Saif  and
Rudzicz, Frank
fraser-etal-2019-feel.typeNotRelevantText: Morality is not a key concept of the paper: The paper analyzes the emotions and sentiments associated with words in tweets posted before and after hitchBOT’s destruction, but mainly focuses on emotions. They find that some Tweets contain moral judgement, but there is nothing more about morality in this paper.
